Tabber automatically create an HTML tab interface using plug-and-play 
JavaScript.
http://www.barelyfitz.com/projects/tabber/

Xmlnuke uses a unchanged version of Tabber. 

The current Tabber edition is 
$Id: tabber.js,v 1.9 2006/04/27 20:51:51 pat Exp $

To use in your XSL you MUST add the follow snippets:
- HTMLHEADERS inside <head> section
- HTMLBODY at the end of document

All changes made by João Gilberto Magalhães at 2008-04-24
